name: SonarJS
initializeCommand: TEMP_WSL=$(wslpath -u "$(cmd.exe /c 'echo %TEMP%' 2>/dev/null | tr -d '\r\n')" 2>/dev/null || echo /tmp) && CERT_SRC=$(wslpath -u "${NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS:-}" 2>/dev/null || echo "${NODE_EXTRA_CA_CERTS:-}") && ([ -n "$CERT_SRC" ] && [ -f "$CERT_SRC" ] && cp "$CERT_SRC" "$TEMP_WSL/devcontainer-corporate-ca.crt" || touch "$TEMP_WSL/devcontainer-corporate-ca.crt")
postCreateCommand: mkdir -p /home/node/.certs && cat /etc/ssl/certs/ca-certificates.crt /tmp/corporate-ca.crt > /home/node/.certs/bundle.pem && mise trust && mise install && git submodule update --init --recursive && npm ci
